amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit the use of funds to enter into a new contract or agreement or to administer a portion of an existing contract with a concessioner in any facility within a unit of the National Park System of an item with a Confederate flag as a stand-alone feature.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to enter into a new contract or agreement or to administer a portion of an existing contract with a concessioner in any facility within a unit of the National Park System of an item with a Confederate flag as a stand-alone feature.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A056) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A056) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A056) offered by Mr. Huffman.
